item.description:
@bobbykinney000 wrote:

i added the ::char command this is it

if (command.startsWith("char")) { showInterface(3559); }

and when u type ::char on my server it opens the rite interface but the arrows dont work so you can choose your clothes and stuff and then your client crashes after like 15 seconds, if someone can help thnx. also i dont want to “just get a new server” i want to fix this problem so if you could help id apreciate it.
